content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disclaimer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is an EPAM training material required to be reviewed by all employees, contractors and subcontractors of EPAM and its affiliates. Although contractors and subcontractors are not employees of EPAM, they are required to comply with the standards in this training while performing services for EPAM. If you are a contractor or subcontractor receiving this training, your contractor status remains unchanged, and is reflected in our systems and within your UPSA profile.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By entering this training, you acknowledge that you are either an employee of EPAM or a contractor or subcontractor performing services for EPAM, and that you will not share or misuse the training material you have accessed or downloaded outside of EPAM. You further acknowledge that by entering this training you expect no privacy from monitoring your progress and reporting your training completion success.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
